mutants.code:
import string

def remove_whitespace_punctuation_digits_and_convert_to_uppercase(text):
    translation_table = str.maketrans('MUTATED', '', string.whitespace + string.punctuation + string.digits)
    result = text.translate(translation_table).upper()
    return result

import string

def remove_whitespace_punctuation_digits_and_convert_to_uppercase(text):
    translation_table = str.maketrans('', 'MUTATED', string.whitespace + string.punctuation + string.digits)
    result = text.translate(translation_table).upper()
    return result

import string

def remove_whitespace_punctuation_digits_and_convert_to_uppercase(text):
    translation_table = str.maketrans('', '', string.whitespace + string.punctuation - string.digits)
    result = text.translate(translation_table).upper()
    return result

import string

def remove_whitespace_punctuation_digits_and_convert_to_uppercase(text):
    translation_table = str.maketrans('', '', (string.whitespace + string.punctuation) * string.digits)
    result = text.translate(translation_table).upper()
    return result
